name: Memory of the Fallen (LD 46)
description:
Game made for LD 46: Keep it Alive

Taking inspiration from Majora's Mask. Take the role of a nameless adventurer in a quest to find what happened to the missing hero and save the town from monsters. Can you keep the memory of the missing hero alive?

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/$193678
